pubinfo.publish: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit

descript.abstract: Annual Minnesota Bear harvest, summarized by bear permit areas.
descript.purpose: To summarize and map bear harvest density.

theme.themekey: Bear Harvest, bear, big game, harvest

place.placekey: Minnesota, bear permit areas, permit areas, bear zones, kill blocks

idinfo.accconst: No special restrictions beyond those described in the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement.
idinfo.useconst: No special restrictions beyond those described in the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement.

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically correct. All polygons are closed and lines intersect where intended.

horizpa.horizpar: Derived from USGS DLG data (transportation and hydrography). Updated annually with boundary changes, using MnDOT roads.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).
